info.title: PSU Research Metadata API
info.description: An API that serves as the authority on faculty and research data at Penn State University in the swagger-2.0 specification.

get.description: Returns a single publication if the user has access

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of publication to fetch

get.description: Returns all publications from the system that the user has access to

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max number publications to return

get.description: Returns organization memberships for a user

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve organization memberships

organization_name.description: The name of the organization to which the user belongs

position_title.description: The user's role or title within the organization

position_started_on.description: The date on which the user joined the organization in this role

position_ended_on.description: The date on which the user left the organization in this role

get.summary: Retrieve a user's news feed items
get.description: Returns a news feed items for a user

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve news feed items

title.description: The title of the news feed item

url.description: The URL where the full news story content can be found

description.example: A news story about a Penn State researcher
description.description: A brief description of the news story content

published_on.description: The date on which the news story was published

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve presentations

activity_insight_identifier.description: The unique identifier for the presentation's corresponding record in the Activity Insight database

organization.description: The name of the organization associated with the presentation

location.description: The name of the location where the presentation took place

started_on.description: The date on which the presentation started

ended_on.description: The date on which the presentation ended

meet_type.description: The meet type of the presentation

attendance.description: The number of people who attended the presentation

refereed.description: Whether or not the presentation was refereed

abstract.example: A presentation about Penn State academic research
abstract.description: A summary of the presentation content

comment.example: The goal of this presentation was to broaden public awareness of a research topic.
comment.description: Miscellaneous comments and notes about the presentation

scope.description: The scope of the audience for the presentation

get.description: Returns a contracts for a user

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve contracts

sponsor.description: The name of the organization sponsoring the contract

amount.description: The monetary amount of the contract in U.S. dollars

ospkey.description: The OSP key of the contract

award_start_on.description: The date on which the contract award starts

award_end_on.description: The date on which the contract award ends

get.summary: Retrieve a user's student advising history
get.description: Returns ETDs for which the user served on the committee

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve ETDs

year.description: The year in which the ETD was completed

author_last_name.description: The last name of the ETD's author

author_first_name.description: The first name of the ETD's author

author_middle_name.description: The first name of the ETD's author

journal_title.description: The title of the journal in which the publication was published

abstract.description: A brief summary of the content of the publication

citation_count.description: The number of times that the publication has been cited in other works

pure_ids.description: Unique identifiers for corresponding records in the Pure database that represent the publication
